title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.124 - Marcy Correctional Facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.124 - Marcy Correctional Facility

State Regulations
(a) There shall be in the department an
institution to be known as Marcy Correctional Facility, which shall be located
in the Town of Marcy in Oneida County and which shall consist of property under
the jurisdiction of the department. (b) Marcy Correctional Facility shall be a
correctional facility for males 18 years of age or older. (c) Marcy Correctional Facility shall be
classified as a medium security facility, to be used as a general confinement
facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
100.124

Amended

New

York State Register July 22, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
